title: Is there a single justifiable reason to pick evelynn over kha'zix?
body:
-can actually do damage without needing to let his target know 3 seconds beforehand
-reliable engage and disengage
-not reliant on his ulti to assassinate targets
-evelynn does not have camouflage before 6 anymore
-not knocked out of stealth if grazed by enemy champion
-not automatically dead if he gets caught
I really cant think of one reason other than that evelynn is better to look at.

replies.body: I can think of one: Evelynn's damage isn't negatively effected if the target isn't isolated...
It kinda is though. A lot of her damage come from Q, which is very hard to hit if the opponent isn't by themselves
aoe and marked
One ability gets 65% more damage. It is significant but people way overstate his reliance on isolation. He still 1shots squishies all the time isolation or not.
Right now a decent chunk of Kha's damage comes from Duskblade procs. Hell, sometimes you don't even Evolve his Q at all.

Yeah that is the crux of it. His passive and Dusk's passive work the same way and both synergize with his ult, making him the best abuse case of the item. He's the only 1 who can use it so many times in rapid succession...other than Vayne who is better off going crit.

"one ability" - yeah his E/W/R are known to deal loads of damage..

Kha is very reliant on his isolation and I promise you that Eve will turn out to be decently strong in soloQ very soon once people learned how to play her. Her playstyle is rather unique after all.
E when you reset if you smart enough to use the damage the R which resets his passive which is another ability and his w is very high damage though its heal isnt as high as it used to be.

E deals super little damage, using the R to reset delays his burst so that I wouldn't really call it oneshotting anyways and his W doesn't come close to the damage of isolated Q. 

His highest damage ability loses 65% - yes that is HUGE for his ability to oneshot.

Techically Neither Khazix or Rengar has ever 1 shot by that explination as they both needed at least 2 casts of q if not 3  along with their other damage unless they super fed where they still need q  2 times
if your target isn't isolated your getting one shot in team fight anyways , so no dmg output .

Oh god that character creeped me out everytime I had to buy from it
Her ass
If your team all picks AD. That's literally the only reason, but even then I think Elise and Diana are better so who knows.

Diana and Elise are completely better picks. Elise ganks better than Eve's retarded stealth range and W mechanic. And Diana has the potential to burst her target down in 1 second. With the durability to survive and really far engage range.

The new Evelyn is a joke.

She has hard CC. 

She is AP which is strictly superior to AD damage in most situations.

She's invisible whenever she's out of combat rather than just during her ult. 

She can go untargetable while blinking away instantly. 

She's way hotter than Kha'zix.

Come on OP.

> [{quoted}](name=DunkinNoobs,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WRM0BbYf,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-10-18T23:50:18.464+0000)
>
> She has hard CC. 
> 
> She is AP which is strictly superior to AD damage in most situations.
> 
> She's invisible whenever she's out of combat rather than just during her ult. 
> 
> She can go untargetable while blinking away instantly. 
> 
> She's way hotter than Kha'zix.
> 
> Come on OP.

She has Hard CC.... That is impossible to land on non retards.

Since when has AP been strictly superior to AD? That is a blatant lie. AD is strictly superior. AD kills minions, champions, towers, and barracks... AP only kills minions and champions. AD kills 2x more things than AP.

Her invisibility doesn't help her during combat, when invisibility is most useful. Her stealth detection radius is so large, that someone running out of the fog at a target and Evelyn running at them is basically the same detection. Her charm negates the suddenness that a gank is supposed to have. If the lane your ganking has CC to lock the enemy down as you run up, any other jungler would of got the job done better and faster.

She can use her ulti to do damage, become unforgettable, and blink away.... Kha zix can jump to his target, while invisible, burst him down. Reset his jump, and jump away. That is strictly better. Let alone he can turn invisible 3 times. So he can close the gap while speed bosted and invisible. or jump to their target. or escape. Strictly better than eve in every way.

Come on Dunkin Noob
AP helps kill towers too. Also what the hell are barracks
I believe he means relatively. AD gets 100% scaling against towers. AP only gets 50% scaling against towers.

Yes, but compare the stats on AP items versus AD items. Deathcap gives you 120 AP.  Infinity Edge gives you 70. The stats themselves are built completely different from each other. If you are at a full AP build, you'll be at like 500-600 AP. An AD build might only reach 300 tops. There's a HUGE reason why you get 100% AD versus towers and 50% AP versus towers, and that reason is so that AP Champs don't insta melt towers.

unless crit is built on khazix, a better comparision would be to use {{item:3147}} {{item:3142}} and possibly {{item:3812}} for comparison.

If crit is built on khazix for some reason, then I suppose he would also use {{item:3046}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} which gives attack speed as a 2nd layer of damage boost, which are decently effective against towers.

~~Unless it's bronze elo where no one knows how to snowball gold advantage,~~ chances are that game ends before full build even happens in majority of games. AP damage dealers tend to get 200~400 in reality by the time a game ends, while AD damage dealers get 200~300 in reality by the time a game ends. Even then not all towers get taken down after those stats are achieved; towers still do get taken down while people only have 1 core item or even just components. And if u look at the components of the AP and AD items, it is pretty clear that AD item build paths are a lot better than AP item build paths, which is why AD is still noticeably superior to AP in tower shredding.
Don't forgot how cheap ad items are in comparison to ap.

Nope false. 

She has a decent slow that sometimes is a charm ( once in blue moon) 

Ap is inferior to ad. Period. Reliability>all

And thats why she has such a bad stealth compared to other champs.

The only good and frankly the only thing in her whole kit that resembles an assassin. 

Cant argue with that.

Bring it on.
Is there a single justifiable reason to pick evelynn is what you meant to say

But in all serious I lost a 1v1 to a Vi who was a lv behind me and had a smaller percentage of hp than me all  because I didnt have my ult up and I couldnt wait for the full charm. Why is it that they like to gimp the ap assassins the hardest or is it just that the ad ones can still auto attack while waiting for their delays to finish

well if you don't have your ult up AND don't land your charm while fighting a duelist.

I would have been suprised if vi lost that

Why pick Evelynn when I can play Elise.

Elise is the best AP jungler hands down.
no there is not one reason sorry
There isint a single justifiable reason to pick evelynn over any jungle champ.
Sex appeal:)

She's permanently stealthed.
Her disengage after deleting a target isn't a jump, but an untargettable blink.
She's AP.
She can provide hard CC from range, rather than only a slow.
She's hot.

Her stealth detection range is 900, which makes her essentially useless after 20 minutes.
Her disengage is more than a minute long rank one. Kha's is only 20 seconds long and costs 40 mana.
AP itemization is less gold efficient and flexible than AD.
Her charm has a 2.5 second delay, and can only target one person, unlike Kha's empowered w.
You're right tho she's one hot tamale.
